params.text:
🚀 Starting CC Fee Letter Agent (Simple Version)...
📧 Basic functionality with minimal dependencies
🧹 Clearing Python cache for fresh start
🌐 Opening in browser at http://localhost:8507

params.message: echo '🧹 Clearing Python cache...' && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
echo '📦 Ensuring core dependencies are ready...' && pip install --upgrade streamlit pandas
echo '🚀 Starting Simple Streamlit application...' && python -m streamlit run simple_app.py --server.port 8507 --server.headless true --browser.gatherUsageStats false --server.address 0.0.0.0
